snippet: Researchers have mapped the precise circuit in the fruit fly brain that enables the tiny animal to detect movement in its visual field.
lead_paragraph: Researchers have mapped the precise circuit in the fruit fly brain that enables the tiny animal to detect movement in its visual field.

headline.main: Mapping the Brain Circuitry That Spots Movement, in Flies
headline.print_headline: Mapping the Brain Circuitry That Spots Movement, in Flies
